mapper.select: select goodsAttrId,goodsVersion,goodsNetType,goodsRom,goodsRam,goodsSize,goodsColor, goodsPrice,goodsResRatio,goodsStock from goods_attributes where goodsId=#{goodsId}
select goodsAttrId,goodsColor,goodsImage from goods_attributes where goodsId=#{goodsId} group by goodsColor
select goodsVersion,goodsNetType,goodsRom,goodsRam,goodsSize,goodsColor, goodsPrice,goodsResRatio from goods_attributes where goodsId=#{goodsId} group by goodsRom,goodsRam
select distinct goodsRom from goods_attributes where goodsId=#{goodsId}
select distinct goodsRam from goods_attributes where goodsId=#{goodsId}
select distinct goodsColor from goods_attributes where goodsId=#{goodsId}
select distinct goodsSize from goods_attributes where goodsId=#{goodsId}

select goodsId,goodsAttrId,goodsRom,goodsRam,goodsSize,goodsColor,goodsPrice,goodsResRatio,goodsImage,goodsStock,goodsNetType from goods_attributes where goodsId=#{goodsId} group by goodsRom,goodsRam,goodsColor
select goodsPrice, goodsImage from goods_attributes where goodsId=#{goodsId} order by goodsPrice
select goodsId,goodsAttrId,goodsImage,goodsPrice from goods_attributes where goodsPrice <= #{price}
select goodsId,goodsAttrId,goodsImage,goodsPrice from goods_attributes where goodsPrice > #{price}
select goodsPrice from goods_attributes where goodsRom=#{0} and goodsRam=#{1}
